name: Cubicle Run
description:
INSANE OFFICE ACTION!

Avoid getting more work by taking out colleagues and co-workers as you escape the office in the new infinite runner action game from HOF Studios.

Cubicle Run is an action oriented infinite runner game for mobile platforms. You control a fully customizable character as you make your way through the office, avoiding work from annoying colleagues and bosses by knocking them out with items you find.

  • Collect greenbacks to buy upgrades, clothing and accessories for your character as you rampage through the office.
  • Customize your character with thousands of options
  • Find and master 8 different weapons
  • Climb the leaderboard as you advance through the office and take down those pesky bosses
NO LONGER AVAILABLE
ON IOS
